name: Password Cracking with Hashcat
description: Execute Hashcat.exe with provided SAM file from registry of Windows and Password list to crack against
false_positives: Tools that accidentally use the same command line flags and values
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\hashcat.exe OR (process.command_line:*\-a\ * AND process.command_line:*\-m\ 1000\ * AND process.command_line:*\-r\ *))`
